## ApiNamespaceAria2.getPeers() method

This method returns a list peers of the download denoted by gid (string). This method is for BitTorrent only. The response is an array of structs. Values are strings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPeers(gid: string): Promise<Peer[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  gid | string | GID |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Peer](./aria2.peer.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

an array of structs
